Title: the long distance dissonance

Sheldon: How are you settling in?
Now, I’ve learned some fun facts about New Jersey to help you make small talk. Would you like to know the state bird or the murder rate? They’re both shocking.
Well, I’m a lot less likely to see an Eastern Goldfinch or be murdered, I’ll tell you that.
I miss you, too.
I’m sorry you had to go through that.
You know you just split an infinitive.
I am. It is naughty to put an adverb between the word to and the verb stem.
I’m going to admonish you.
That’s the only kind of admonishing I do.
Gentlemen. You may remember Dr. Nowitzki, She’s back at Caltech for her postdoc.
Oh, thanks. Dr. Nowitzki’s going to tell me about the work she did at CERN. And she brought me this duty-free Toblerone.
Let’s sit somewhere else.
So, tell me about your scalar dark energy experiment.
Oh. You must be one of those dessert before dinner people.
And get this, I saw an articulating ladder with dual-leg leveling, which delivers stability and adaptability to uneven terrain.
Yeah. Raj made the funniest joke, he said, which is the best ladder to use to hang myself?
Oh, not at all. I’ve had outings with Leonard and Raj in the evening, and, oh, I had lunch
Oh, Dr. Nowitzki is a woman.
Many years ago. Back when she was a grad student. She’s always been a huge fan of my work, and now she’s doing research at Caltech.
Yes. I think you’d like her. She’s extremely intelligent, just like you. Unlike you, she’s tall, blonde and used to be an Olympic swimmer.
Hey, everybody. This is my friend, Dr. Nowitzki.
We just went swimming.
I was scared, but I told myself it’s just a big bathtub. Then I got scared again ’cause there are all these strangers in my bathtub.
Well, I was hiding from a bee, but it still counts.
Yes, we skyped this morning and I’m sure I’ll check in with her before I go to sleep.
That is true. She keeps asking how long Amy’s going to be gone.
Leonard, your wife is sitting right here. What are you doing?
She was part of the American team at CERN.
Do you know, I’ve corresponded with Peter Higgs. Would you like to see some of his letters?
I’ll get them.
Oh, fun. Like a play date.
Here you go.
Hmm? Oh, no, no, no. They’re from many famous people. See? Oh, like this one. This is from Patrick Stewart. It says if I come to his house again, I get to meet his dogs. Oh, excuse me.
Oh, hello, Amy.
I miss you, too. Hey, this is good timing. Remember that Dr. Nowitzki I told you about? She’s right here.
What is Leonard doing calling you at this hour?
I must tell you, that seems a little inappropriate. Don’t you agree?
See? We both think so.
Hey, I hate to break up the party, but Amy says I’m tired and have to go to bed.
Of course.
That was fun. It was like Mario Kart.
Bye.
What? Is this about Leonard and Amy? I don’t like it either.
That doesn’t make any sense. She knows I have a girlfriend.
That may be true, but Dr. Nowitzki’s just a friend. In fact, I wouldn’t have even noticed she’s a woman if she hadn’t worn that bathing suit that highlighted her bosom.
I already do.
Because there’s only one of me, I’m more valuable.
Although, Amy’s already taken me out of my package and played with me.
Penny, look. I appreciate your concern, but I don’t think that’s what’s happening.
I think Dr. Nowitzki is a friendly colleague. I think you and Leonard need to see a marriage counsellor. And I need to update my résumé to include swimming as a special skill.
Uh, breakfast yes, lunch no. I did have a cough drop, but that really rides the line between sucking and eating.
How thoughtful. Thank you.
And I with you. Question, are you seeking a romantic relationship with me?
Well, that would raise a number of problems. We’re colleagues. I’m currently in a relation… Excuse me a moment.
(Knock, knock, knock) Amy. (Knock, knock, knock) Amy. (Knock, knock, knock) Amy. Will you marry me?
Amy: Pretty well. Princeton has a beautiful campus.
Actually, I want to hear about you. How are things at home?
I miss you.
It’s so strange, earlier today I ended a sentence with a preposition and you weren’t there to correct my grammar.
In fact, that’s when I started to really miss you.
Did I? Are you gonna teach me a lesson?
What are you gonna do about it?
Vigorously?
Sounds like a big night.
So you’re keeping busy? You’re not lonely?
Who’s he?
Oh. Really? Uh, when did you meet her?
Huge fan, you say?
That’s terrific. I’ll call you right back.
I gave you one job. Keep an eye on him. How hard is that?
Why didn’t you tell me?
Should I worry?
That’s what you said to me when I started dating him. And then five years later, bingo bango, something happened.
You don’t get it. I’ve been smacking that ketchup bottle for a long time. All she’s got to do is tip it over and point it at her fries.
I don’t know. Might be the New Jersey talking, but this Nowitzki broad needs to disappear.
Yeah, but one of those scientists is a tall, blonde Olympic swimmer.
Nice try.
Hello, Sheldon.
I was missing you again.
She’s what?
Hi.
Uh-huh. Hang on. (answering phone) Hello. A little late, Leonard. Sorry.
It’s not important.
Howard: How’s Sheldon doing with Amy gone?
If you’d like, we can help you out.
I mean, not me, I’ve got a wife and child, but this one posts video of himself flossing on Instagram.
A stranger just lured Sheldon away with a candy bar.
Oh, yeah. Back before he hit puberty and grew man parts.
Yeah. Like Bernadette used to look at me.
Okay, the simplest explanation is usually the right one.
It’s unbelievable. Sheldon has lunch with another woman and somehow my wife yells at me.
Guys. Focus. Should we do something about Nowitzki?
She’s not that kind of doctor.
We should call Guinness, that might be a record.
You done trying to make yourself feel better?
Leonard: Well, the last three nights I’ve had to take him to get a haircut, to the train store, and to a Walgreens in Arcadia where they still have the good ibuprofen. Now ask me how I’m doing with Amy gone.
Shut up.
Oh, that would be great.
Great. Tonight he wants to look at ladders at Home Depot.
Hello.
Oh. I love those.
Wait, isn’t she the grad student that used to follow him around?
Knowing Sheldon, nothing.
He just made her laugh, something’s wrong.
Ah, did you see that? She just touched his hand and he didn’t swat it away. What is happening?
Penny laid into me, too. Apparently, I’m overly fixated on premium Swiss chocolate bars.
If I take a Lactaid a half-hour before and some Pepto right after.
Eh, I’m worth it.
Like what?
No offence, Stuart, but the woman’s a doctor.
You kept walking. I think you did.
Yeah, she’s definitely going after Sheldon.
And you actually got in a pool?
Uh, so, Ramona, tell us about yourself. Do you, do you have a boyfriend?
You think you should call Amy?
You got feet and legs, you do it.
Our pleasure.
Raj: How are you doing with…
It was a tutorial. And yes, I’m happy to keep Sheldon company.
Oh, why does he need a ladder?
Hi. Oh, let me bring a chair for you.
What just happened?
So what do you guys think that’s about?
Do you see the way she’s looking at him?
I keep telling you, close the bathroom door.
Which is?
Can you even eat those things?
Sounds like a lot of work.
Uh, well, she’s single, so if somebody else asks her out and she says yes, then we know she’s not into Sheldon.
Actually, I was going to suggest me.
Dr. Nowitzki. Good to see you.
May I join you?
Good to see you.
She’s clearly having a working lunch and preferred to eat alone.
I could have made her very happy.
I made a play for her and she shot me down.
Like, really, a million?
Thank you.
I think you made that very clear.
We’re being ridiculous. There’s no way a woman that attractive is trying to seduce Sheldon Cooper.
No. I haven’t played the race card yet.
Whatever.
Leonard: He doesn\u2019t: he just likes looking at them. Bring a book.
Ramona: Not ’til you tell me about your latest paper on quantum loop theory.
I was proud of him, a lot of people don’t put their face in the water on the first day.
Sheldon talks about her all the time. I can’t wait to meet her.
No, my work doesn’t leave me a lot of time for relationships.
I had a front row seat when they detected the Higgs boson.
Well, hang on, I’ll come with you.
Are these all from Peter Higgs?
It was nice seeing everybody. Thank you for dinner.
Well, perfect. I made us sandwiches.
Mmm. No big deal, I enjoy spending time with you.
Penny: Not only did they eat together, Leonard said he made her laugh.
Did he Purell?
I cannot believe Leonard mentioned the Toblerone but left that part out.
Yeah. Do you think living with Amy has somehow stirred up Sheldon’s sexual appetite?
All right, then we agree. He’s not making any moves, it’s this Dr. Ramona chick.
Really? All I got from Leonard was the Toblerone bar had nuts.
We thought you meant not letting him run out into traffic.
No. Come on, it’s Sheldon. Nothing is gonna happen.
Well, what do you want us to do?
Come on. Looks don’t matter to Sheldon. Because he only has eyes for you.
Thanks. I was scrambling.
Do you really think there’s reason to worry?
All right, well, that doesn’t prove anything.
The point is this could be nothing and we are all overreacting.
So, Sheldon, have you talked to Amy?
Okay, correct me if I’m wrong, but isn’t that exactly what we were supposed to stop from happening?
You got fingers and a mouth, you call her.
All right, this is making me crazy. Somebody’s got to go over there.
Will you go with me?
Sure.
We’ll all go.
Pardon. I just need to., yeah.
We need to talk.
Okay, I know you don’t have a lot of experience with women, but Ramona seems to have a romantic interest in you.
Well, sometimes women don’t care. Sometimes it makes them want a guy even more.
Okay. Um, let’s try this. Think of yourself as one of those limited edition toys people like to collect.
Well, then you get it.
Right.
Let’s forget the toy thing, okay? Um, maybe…
All right. What do you think is happening?
Don’t look at me like that, I tried.
Bernadette: That’s nothing, Howie said she touched his hand.
I guess we could wait till we have more information about this girl.
Ugh. How can you think that? Why would you even put those words together?
Nowitzki. I googled her, she’s pretty cute.
We didn’t want you to worry.
Yeah, but you’re gonna be back in three months.
That’s ridiculous. As far as we know, all that happened is two scientists had lunch.
Yeah, there’s a million reasons a woman would shoot Raj down.
Can I just squeeze in here?
I threw my body at them, what else did you want me to do?
To do what? Shake a can of nickels at them?
Penny: I don\u2019t know: we shouldn’t worry her if it’s nothing.
Stuart: So? Doctors like me. Whenever I see mine he calls in a bunch of other doctors to have a look.
Oh. Well, her loss. I’ve been called a genuine medical oddity.
Excuse me. They took out my spleen and gallbladder, not my feelings.

Hey, everybody. This is my friend, Dr. Nowitzki.
And you actually got in a pool?
I was scared, but I told myself it’s just a big bathtub. Then I got scared again ’cause there are all these strangers in my bathtub.
I was proud of him, a lot of people don’t put their face in the water on the first day.
Well, I was hiding from a bee, but it still counts.
Can I just squeeze in here?
So, Sheldon, have you talked to Amy?
Yes, we skyped this morning and I’m sure I’ll check in with her before I go to sleep.
Sheldon talks about her all the time. I can’t wait to meet her.
That is true. She keeps asking how long Amy’s going to be gone.
Uh, so, Ramona, tell us about yourself. Do you, do you have a boyfriend?
Leonard, your wife is sitting right here. What are you doing?
No, my work doesn’t leave me a lot of time for relationships.
I think you made that very clear.
She was part of the American team at CERN.
I had a front row seat when they detected the Higgs boson.
Do you know, I’ve corresponded with Peter Higgs. Would you like to see some of his letters?
Well, hang on, I’ll come with you.
Oh, fun. Like a play date.
Okay, correct me if I’m wrong, but isn’t that exactly what we were supposed to stop from happening?
I threw my body at them, what else did you want me to do?
You think you should call Amy?
You got fingers and a mouth, you call her.
Are these all from Peter Higgs?
Hmm? Oh, no, no, no. They’re from many famous people. See? Oh, like this one. This is from Patrick Stewart. It says if I come to his house again, I get to meet his dogs. Oh, excuse me.
I miss you, too. Hey, this is good timing. Remember that Dr. Nowitzki I told you about? She’s right here.
Uh-huh. Hang on. (answering phone) Hello. A little late, Leonard. Sorry.
What is Leonard doing calling you at this hour?
I must tell you, that seems a little inappropriate. Don’t you agree?
All right, this is making me crazy. Somebody’s got to go over there.
You got feet and legs, you do it.
To do what? Shake a can of nickels at them?
We’re being ridiculous. There’s no way a woman that attractive is trying to seduce Sheldon Cooper.
You done trying to make yourself feel better?
No. I haven’t played the race card yet.
Hey, I hate to break up the party, but Amy says I’m tired and have to go to bed.
It was nice seeing everybody. Thank you for dinner.
Pardon. I just need to., yeah.
That was fun. It was like Mario Kart.
What? Is this about Leonard and Amy? I don’t like it either.
Okay, I know you don’t have a lot of experience with women, but Ramona seems to have a romantic interest in you.
That doesn’t make any sense. She knows I have a girlfriend.
Well, sometimes women don’t care. Sometimes it makes them want a guy even more.
That may be true, but Dr. Nowitzki’s just a friend. In fact, I wouldn’t have even noticed she’s a woman if she hadn’t worn that bathing suit that highlighted her bosom.
Okay. Um, let’s try this. Think of yourself as one of those limited edition toys people like to collect.
Because there’s only one of me, I’m more valuable.
Although, Amy’s already taken me out of my package and played with me.
Let’s forget the toy thing, okay? Um, maybe…
Penny, look. I appreciate your concern, but I don’t think that’s what’s happening.
All right. What do you think is happening?
I think Dr. Nowitzki is a friendly colleague. I think you and Leonard need to see a marriage counsellor. And I need to update my résumé to include swimming as a special skill.
Don’t look at me like that, I tried.
Uh, breakfast yes, lunch no. I did have a cough drop, but that really rides the line between sucking and eating.
Well, perfect. I made us sandwiches.
Mmm. No big deal, I enjoy spending time with you.
And I with you. Question, are you seeking a romantic relationship with me?
Well, that would raise a number of problems. We’re colleagues. I’m currently in a relation… Excuse me a moment.
(Knock, knock, knock) Amy. (Knock, knock, knock) Amy. (Knock, knock, knock) Amy. Will you marry me?
